name: Impossible Jumpy Quest
description:
The game has a simplistic, colorful artstyle, that is inviting when played through.
In this game you have to overcome more than 85+ increasingly challengeing levels.
By getting the timing, positionplay and mechanics right,
you will succed in reaching the end goal of each level.
Now with level selection, Normal and Challenge Mode.

By jumping and running around from one block to another, over
moving platforms, rotating obstacles and various other logic puzzles.
When the red end block is reached, you will be transported to
the next level.

Fun for all ages and skill levels.
A game to casually immerse yourself with.
No microtransactions, no agegated content, just pure fun.
Can help change your train of thought, when you need a time out.
